label.text: Fill in the following if known

A distance marker with the Shape value set above should be considered as sign=on (signed).

list_entry.short_description: Inadequate or Inaccurate data or unreliable source

label.text: Left side of way is top of Cliff, right side bottom.
All navigatable rivers should be tagged this way. Smaller rivers or streams that might be accessable with cannoes and smaller leasure crafts can still be tagged as natural=river or natural=steam

list_entry.short_description: Trail well cleared. Area flat or slightly sloped, no fall hazard
Trail with continuous line and balanced ascent. Terrain partially steep, fall hazard possible
exposed sites may be secured with ropes or chains, possible need to use hands for balance. Partly exposed sites with fall hazard, scree, pathless jagged rocks

list_entry.display_value: T4 - difficult, exposed, steep alpine trail
list_entry.short_description: sometimes need for hand use to get ahead. Terrain quite exposed, precarious grassy acclivities, jagged rocks, facile snow-free glaciers

list_entry.display_value: T5 - difficult alpine trail with climbing
list_entry.short_description: single plainly climbing up to second grade. Exposed, demanding terrain, jagged rocks, few dangerous glacier and snow

list_entry.display_value: T6 - hazardous alpine trail with climbing
list_entry.short_description: climbing up to second grade. Often very exposed, precarious jagged rocks, glacier with danger to slip and fall

If Rescue Station is combined with Coastguard Station, consider using tagging scheme for Coastguard (T11)
If contact details are left blank, one can assume that the lifeboat or rescue station is not manned 24h, and a local coast radio station must be contacted

Facilities available at or near this marina
This tag should be used of appropriate type of berth.
If the Nautical Club offers several services open for public or non-member visitors, see U32
Note: This can also be tagged as shop=convinience, shop=general or shop=greengrocer.
All these tags will be treated equally in a rendererer, but shop=supermarket chosen as most common.
